H0.text: Give a year in the life of Miguel Cervantes, Spanish novelist, poet and playwright. 1575

H1.text: Give a year in the life of Miguel Cervantes, Spanish novelist, poet and playwright. 1605

H2.text: Give a year in the life of Miguel Cervantes, Spanish novelist, poet and playwright. 1580

H3.text: Give a year in the life of Miguel Cervantes, Spanish novelist, poet and playwright. 1547-1616

A4.text: Miguel de Cervantes Saavedra ( sur-VAN-teez, -⁠tiz; Spanish: [miˈɣel de θeɾˈβantes saːˈβeðɾa]; 29 September 1547 (assumed) – 22 April 1616)

A5.text: In 1575, he was captured by Barbary pirates; after five years in captivity, he was ransomed, and returned to Madrid.

A6.text: Don Quixote, the full title being The Ingenious Gentleman Don Quixote of La Mancha, is a Spanish novel by Miguel de Cervantes. Originally published in two parts in 1605 and 1615
